import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import api from '../../providers/api'; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Articles () { let { slug } = useParams(); const [articles, setArticles] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { api.get(`/articles`) .then(res => { const articles = res.data.articles; setArticles( articles ); }) }, []) return (<>
